Description:
Assist with the sourcing of candidates for media production positions, utilizing job boards, social media, and other recruitment channels
Review resumes and applications, and conduct initial screenings of candidates
Schedule interviews and coordinate interview logistics, including room reservations, travel arrangements, and candidate communication
Participate in candidate interviews and provide feedback to the Talent Acquisition Manager
Assist with the preparation of job offers and employment agreements
Conduct reference and background checks on potential hires
Assist with the onboarding process for new hires, including paperwork, orientation, and training
Maintain accurate records and documentation related to recruitment and hiring activities
Assist with the development and implementation of talent acquisition strategies and initiativesSkills
Skills:
Experience in a talent acquisition or recruitment role, preferably in media production or related field
Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build relationships with candidates, hiring managers, and other stakeholders
Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities
Attention to detail and ability to maintain accurate records and documentation
Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment
Familiarity with applicant tracking systems and other recruitment software preferred
Knowledge of media production and the media industry a plus
